articles.author: Bridget Brown, Bernard McGhee, Curtis Yee, Luena Rodriguez-Feo Vileira, Nell Clark, Kiana Doyle
articles.title: Live updates: Trump administration limits refugee admissions to mostly white South Africans - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump's administration is restricting the number of refugees it admits into the country to 7,500, and they will mostly be white South Africans.
articles.content: Refugee advocacy groups are sharing strong reactions to the Trump administrations new limit on entries from last years ceiling of 125,000 set under Democratic President Joe Biden to 7,500, who will m… [+762 chars]
